data.quote: You always gain by giving love
data.author: Reese Witherspoon

data.quote: Happiness is a state of mind
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: You can only connect the dots looking backwards
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Change the world by being yourself
data.author: Amy Poehler

data.quote: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today
data.author: James Dean

data.quote: Only the gentle are really strong
data.author: James Dean

data.quote: Nothing will work unless you do
data.author: Maya Angelou
